releaseNotes:

description:
OVER 4 MILLION DOWNLOADS AND COUNTING!

Who knew a Monkey could teach? Well, at Zoolingo, ‘Moolingo’ is a qualified preschool teacher, in 16 different languages! 

Set the stage for learning with over 1000+ fun and educational activities and games! This delightfully interactive smart app for kids makes learning a blast. Learn ABCs, 123s, colors, shapes, and more! Available in 16 languages! Skip, sing, and dance popular nursery rhymes with Moolingo the monkey. Try it now for FREE

> Certified 5 stars by Educational App Store

List of educational topics that your child will learn:

Alphabet letters
Numbers
Colors
Shapes
Body Parts
Fruits & Vegetables
Emotions
Seasons
Days of the week
Months of the year
Opposite words
Flags of the world
Occupations
Animals
Size & Position Vocabulary
Spelling of all Vocabulary words
A Complete Preschool & Grade 1 Maths program

List of Art & Logical Games for your child to enjoy:

Coloring Pages
Hundreds of jigsaw Puzzles
Baby Animal Puzzles
Connect the dot games
Amazing Mazes
Zoo Game (wash, feed, dress, and learn animal sounds)
Sing along Nursery Rhymes





At Zoolingo, multilingual learning is promoted and it assists parents in bringing up multilingual children. Children from multilingual families are given the chance to play this app in any of 16 different languages. This feature also makes this app useful for children learning an additional language. 

MULTILINGUAL SUPPORT:
Sound and text instructions for multiple languages, including: 
- English
- Japanese 
- Mandarin (Chinese) 
- Spanish 
- Norwegian 
- French 
- German 
- Russian 
- Turkish 
- Italian 
- Danish 
- Swedish 
- Portuguese 
- South Korean
- Indonesian
- Arabic 

With a swipe of a finger, you can reach 16 different languages in seconds! Parents can lock a particular language if they want their child to play in one language only. 


With such a wide variety of learning activities, new ones being added frequently, and its top-notch presentation, you may well find that Zoolingo is the right app for your child. Download it now to see what it offers!


ZOOLINGO PREMIUM:
Access all toddler & preschool games, activities and more with a paid subscription. 

Choose from three subscription options:
- $8.99 per month
- $17.99 per quarter
- $47.99 per year
*Note: prices may vary, please see inside the app for the up to date prices.

Zoolingo offers a free trial to access the full app content and features. Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited if you purchase a paid subscription before the end. You may cancel or manage the free trial or any of the paid subscriptions from your iTunes account settings. Auto-renewal may also be turned off via the account settings in iTunes.

Your account will be charged for renewal of the chosen subscription within 24-hours prior to the end of the current subscription period. Cancellation of the current active subscription is not possible during the active subscription period. Paid subscriptions automatically renew within 24-hours prior to the end of the current active subscription period.

Note that prices of paid subscriptions may vary depending on your country. The actual amount charged will be presented to you in your local currency at the time of first purchase.

WHAT USERS ARE SAYING:

"This preschool game is one of the most fun kid games on the market. My son can simply not leave it alone and has put many hours into it. A great game, would highly recommend."

"My 2 year old brother loves this game! He won't give my iPad back until it is dead flat!"

"For a kid game this really proved to be fun. My daughter is in preschool and she loved the simple strategies and gameplay. Love the music and I would recommend this app to anyone who wants to improve their kids critical thinking."
